snippet.title: Wraithbinder Trailer - Early Access Pre-Launch - May 2024
snippet.description:
Wishlist Wraithbinder on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2126370/Wraithbinder/

Wraithbinder is an action roguelike RPG with secrets, loot, necromancy and metroidvania-inspired ability progression from the creator of Songbringer. Each run you build a different sequence of weapons, abilities and relics. Keep your armor, stats and gold across runs. Play offline solo. Online co-op coming soon.

Hark! The playlist for this series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOpeoDNlbwUFyrQKQObHAv4KZuVXNsxRY

Join Wraithbinder's Discord server: https://discord.gg/kTzv9jzpqA

Wraithbinder is set in the Songbringer universe. http://songbringer.com

Behold the latest Wraithbinder GIFs on Twitter: https://twitter.com/wizard_fu

#roguelike #indiegame #gaming
